      Constructs a photo with the specified caption, path, and last modified date.
      Parameters:
      caption - The caption of the photo.
      photoPath - The path of the photo.

      Checks if the photo contains a specific tag.
      Parameters:
      tagVal - The value of the tag to check.
      Returns:
      true if the photo contains the specified tag, otherwise false.
